content:
There are currently two PRs for review for the next version 0.3.2 - Anyone open to test and review these?

  • https://github.com/gdcc/pyDataverse/pull/175
  • https://github.com/gdcc/pyDataverse/pull/172

I have tested them already locally, but it would be great to have a second perspective :smile:
Hmm, I'm trying to remember who else seemed keen to contribute to pyDataverse. @Brian Brock I believe. Others?
Should we put a call out for reviewers and testers on the google group?
Yes, that makes sense. I have also asked a PhD colleague of mine if he can review them. He is a Pythonista
I see a review on https://github.com/gdcc/pyDataverse/pull/175 :tada:
Yea, my other PhD buddy stepped in :raised_hands:
Man, it's nice to have a PhD buddy :heart:
True that, but hacking buddies are equally nice :heart:
